Description: Saudi Automotive Services Co (known as: Sasco) is a public company, listed on Saudi Stock Exchange “Tadawul” (TDWL) since January 1993. Sasco operates within the Retailing sector focusing on Automotive Retail. It has Companies operating across Saudi Arabia. Sasco is based in Riyadh, Saudi Arabia and was established in December 1981.
